title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2212.3 - Payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2212.3 - Payment

State Regulations

Awards made pursuant to this Part shall be paid, where
applicable, on prorated basis for each semester, quarter or other term of
attendance, as designated by the corporation. Each such term payment shall be
paid by the corporation directly to the award recipient's institution of
attendance, on behalf of such award recipient, after the institution has
certified the award recipient's eligibility to the corporation pursuant to
section
2212.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2212.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
